about:
My name is Mitchell Quarrie, but I go by Mitch. I have recently completed a course with Mission Ready HQ, I also hold a Bachelor of Information Technology from the Southern Institute of Technology (SIT).
My interests are in all areas of programming, including but not limited to web and mobile applications and desktop development. Iâ€™m happy to be starting my career in an industry I love and enjoy learning new languages while further perfecting my knowledge and skills in languages I am already familiar with.
I have experience in developing for a range of platforms and frameworks including Flutter, C#, and React. I have had the opportunity to be involved in some exciting projects through my course including Revived Design and the Discover Deep Cove app
I am ideally seeking a full-time permanent position with a company that I can learn and grow with through my IT journey.
